Role.description: This resource defines a user role to be used in conjunction with a Manager Account.
Role.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent the user role for the user account.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AssignedPrivileges.description: The redfish privileges that this role includes.
AssignedPrivileges.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the redfish privileges that the role includes. For pre-defined roles, this property shall be readOnly. For custom roles some implementations may not allow writing this property.

IsPredefined.description: This property is used to indicate if the Role is one of the Redfish Predefined Roles vs a Custom role.
IsPredefined.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if the role is a predefined role. .

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OemPrivileges.description: The OEM privileges that this role includes.
OemPrivileges.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the OEM privileges that this role includes. For pre-defined roles, this property shall be readOnly. For custom roles some implementations may not allow writing this property.

title: #Role.v1_0_4.Role
